General.Name: Rare Element Resources Ltd
General.Description: Rare Element Resources Ltd. engages in the exploration of mineral properties in the United States. It holds a 100% interest in the Bear Lodge property that comprises the Bear Lodge REE project and the Sundance Gold project located in Crook County, northeast Wyoming. Rare Element Resources Ltd. is headquartered in Littleton, Colorado.
General.Address: PO Box 271049, Littleton, CO, United States, 80127
